item.title: How To Configure Oracle BI Publisher to Authenticate With Active Directory
item.author: toby.marks@infolob.com (Toby Marks)
item.description: Log in to BI Publisher as an administrator. Click on the Admin tab. Click on Security Configuration. For Security Model, choose LDAP and enter the following parameters: Setting Example Value URL ldap://ad.mycompany.com:389 Your company’s LDAP server and port. Administrator Username CN=ADMIN,OU=Users,OU=Shared Services,DC=mycompany,DC=com The fully qualified DN of the account you use to sign in to LDAP. Administrator Password myxlplyx The password for the above account.
